languages.text: "Так, значит, вы встречаете Вольного Торговца?" {n}, — ноздри сенешаля раздуваются от гнева.{/n} "Я позабочусь, чтобы Мастер дисциплины лично призвала к ответу того, кто посмел оставить здесь это... этот возмутительный символ!"

"Is this the welcome you give the Rogue Trader?" {n}Abelard's nostrils flare in anger.{/n} "Whoever had the audacity to leave behind this... this appalling symbol, I will see to it that the Master-at-Arms calls them to account herself!"
languages.original_text: "Так, значит, вы встречаете Вольного Торговца?" {n}, — ноздри сенешаля раздуваются от гнева.{/n} "Я позабочусь, чтобы Мастер дисциплины лично призвала к ответу того, кто посмел оставить здесь это... этот возмутительный символ!"

traits.locale_text: "Is this the welcome you give the Rogue Trader?" {n}Abelard's nostrils flare in anger.{/n} "Whoever had the audacity to leave behind this... this appalling symbol, I will see to it that the Master-at-Arms calls them to account herself!"

"Is this the welcome you give the Rogue Trader?" {n}Abelard's nostrils flare in anger.{/n} "Whoever had the audacity to leave behind this... this appalling symbol, I will see to it that the Master-at-Arms calls them to account herself!"

"Is this the welcome you give the Rogue Trader?" {n}Abelard's nostrils flare in anger.{/n} "Whoever had the audacity to leave behind this... this appalling symbol, I will see to it that the Master-at-Arms calls them to account herself!"

"Is this the welcome you give the Rogue Trader?" {n}Abelard's nostrils flare in anger.{/n} "Whoever had the audacity to leave behind this... this appalling symbol, I will see to it that the Master-at-Arms calls them to account herself!"

"Is this the welcome you give the Rogue Trader?" {n}Abelard's nostrils flare in anger.{/n} "Whoever had the audacity to leave behind this... this appalling symbol, I will see to it that the Master-at-Arms calls them to account herself!"

"Is this the welcome you give the Rogue Trader?" {n}Abelard's nostrils flare in anger.{/n} "Whoever had the audacity to leave behind this... this appalling symbol, I will see to it that the Master-at-Arms calls them to account herself!"

languages.text: « Est-ce là l'accueil que vous réservez {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} ? » {n}Les narines d'Abélard se dilatent sous l'effet de la colère.{/n} « Celui ou celle qui a eu l'audace de dessiner ce... cet effroyable symbole devra rendre des comptes à la capitaine d'armes elle-même, j'y veillerai personnellement ! »
languages.original_text: "Is this the welcome you give the Rogue Trader?" {n}Abelard's nostrils flare in anger.{/n} "Whoever had the audacity to leave behind this... this appalling symbol, I will see to it that the Master-at-Arms calls them to account herself!"

traits.locale_text: « Est-ce là l'accueil que vous réservez {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} ? » {n}Les narines d'Abélard se dilatent sous l'effet de la colère.{/n} « Celui ou celle qui a eu l'audace de dessiner ce... cet effroyable symbole devra rendre des comptes à la capitaine d'armes elle-même, j'y veillerai personnellement ! »

languages.text: «¿Es esta la bienvenida que dedican a su Comerciante Independiente?». {n}Abelard resopla, furioso.{/n} «Quienquiera que haya tenido la audacia de dejar este... este símbolo espantoso... ¡Me aseguraré de que responda ante la maestra de armas personalmente!».
languages.original_text: "Is this the welcome you give the Rogue Trader?" {n}Abelard's nostrils flare in anger.{/n} "Whoever had the audacity to leave behind this... this appalling symbol, I will see to it that the Master-at-Arms calls them to account herself!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Es esta la bienvenida que dedican a su Comerciante Independiente?». {n}Abelard resopla, furioso.{/n} «Quienquiera que haya tenido la audacia de dejar este... este símbolo espantoso... ¡Me aseguraré de que responda ante la maestra de armas personalmente!».

languages.text: 「これが自由開拓者に対する歓迎の仕方か？」{n}アベラルドの鼻が怒りで熱くなる。{/n}誰であろうと、この…このおぞましいシンボルを残した不届者は、マスター・アット・アームズが直接非難するだろう！」
languages.original_text: "Is this the welcome you give the Rogue Trader?" {n}Abelard's nostrils flare in anger.{/n} "Whoever had the audacity to leave behind this... this appalling symbol, I will see to it that the Master-at-Arms calls them to account herself!"

traits.locale_text: 「これが自由開拓者に対する歓迎の仕方か？」{n}アベラルドの鼻が怒りで熱くなる。{/n}誰であろうと、この…このおぞましいシンボルを残した不届者は、マスター・アット・アームズが直接非難するだろう！」

languages.text: “你就是这么欢迎行商浪人的吗？”{n}阿贝拉德愤怒地喘着粗气。{/n}“好大的胆子，竟敢留下这种……骇人听闻的记号！我要让戒律大师亲自把那个罪魁祸首揪出来！”
languages.original_text: "Is this the welcome you give the Rogue Trader?" {n}Abelard's nostrils flare in anger.{/n} "Whoever had the audacity to leave behind this... this appalling symbol, I will see to it that the Master-at-Arms calls them to account herself!"

traits.locale_text: “你就是这么欢迎行商浪人的吗？”{n}阿贝拉德愤怒地喘着粗气。{/n}“好大的胆子，竟敢留下这种……骇人听闻的记号！我要让戒律大师亲自把那个罪魁祸首揪出来！”

languages.text: "Sieht so Euer Willkommen für {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} aus?" {n}Abelards Nasenflügel beben vor Wut.{/n} "Wer immer die Dreistigkeit besaß, dieses ... widerwärtige Symbol zu hinterlassen, wird vom Waffenmeister persönlich zur Rechenschaft gezogen, dafür werde ich sorgen!"
languages.original_text: "Is this the welcome you give the Rogue Trader?" {n}Abelard's nostrils flare in anger.{/n} "Whoever had the audacity to leave behind this... this appalling symbol, I will see to it that the Master-at-Arms calls them to account herself!"

traits.locale_text: "Sieht so Euer Willkommen für {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} aus?" {n}Abelards Nasenflügel beben vor Wut.{/n} "Wer immer die Dreistigkeit besaß, dieses ... widerwärtige Symbol zu hinterlassen, wird vom Waffenmeister persönlich zur Rechenschaft gezogen, dafür werde ich sorgen!"

languages.text: "Hür Tacir'i böyle mi karşılıyorsunuz yani?" {n}Abelard burnundan soluyor.{/n} "Bu sembolün... Bu iğrenç sembolün burada bulunmasına hangi edepsiz sebep olduysa Silahtar'a bizzat hesap verecek, andım olsun!"
languages.original_text: "Is this the welcome you give the Rogue Trader?" {n}Abelard's nostrils flare in anger.{/n} "Whoever had the audacity to leave behind this... this appalling symbol, I will see to it that the Master-at-Arms calls them to account herself!"
